title: 100,000 MT of Wheat flour to increase livestock products
content: Sri Lankaâ€™s State Minister of Livestock, Farm Promotion and Dairy & Egg Related Industries D. B. Herath said another 100,000 MT of wheat flour will be imported to Sri Lanka to increase production of animal products.The State Minister stated that permission was granted to import 40,000 MT of Wheat Flour earlier.Most of the Wheat Flour has been imported so far and the remaining 8000 MT of Wheat Flour is expected to reach the country, soon.
